fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Conversationalist: If you open 2 channels with the same player, learn if they truly win with you. 
- Storyteller: Learn a playerâ€™s name. The room they went to last night has at least 2 Order members. Influenceable. [Activates D2]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Distract: Choose a player. If they do not win with you, drop their hand size by 1 for the next phase. Influenceable. [2 uses, 2 CD]
- Weave: Choose a player. If they do not win with you, cause them to draw 2 less cards at the end of the phase. Influenceable. [1 use, Unique] 
- Dream: Choose a player. If they do not win with you, permanently decrease their end of phase draw by 1. Influenceable. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D3]
